nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: i1
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Besides speech, people use other forms to communicate.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: i2
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: We communicate a great deal with our body movements.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: i3
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The clothes you wear also communicate many things.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: i4
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Small ornaments you wear communicate many things, too.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: i5
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: A wealth of information from body language makes snap judgments seem sound.
